dcterms:creator: Holger R Roth
Le Lu
Amal Farag
Hoo-Chang Shin
Jiamin Liu
Evrim B Turkbey
Ronald M Summers
dcterms:description: The NIH Pancreas-CT Dataset consists of 82 abdominal 3D CT scans from 53 male and 27 female subjects, selected by radiologists from patients without major abdominal pathologies or pancreatic cancer lesions.
dcterms:title: NIH Pancreas-CT Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jinwon An
Sungzoon Cho
dcterms:description: The Medical Segmentation Decathlon (MSD) collects 420 abdominal 3D CT scans from Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, with many subjects having cancer lesions within the pancreas region.
dcterms:title: Medical Segmentation Decathlon (MSD)

dcterms:creator: Unknown
dcterms:description: The Synapse Dataset provides 50 abdomen CT scans randomly selected from a combination of an ongoing colorectal cancer chemotherapy trial and a retrospective ventral hernia study.
dcterms:title: Synapse Dataset
